camel.kamelet.fhir-source.encoding.name: camel.kamelet.fhir-source.encoding
camel.kamelet.fhir-source.encoding.description: Encoding to use for all request. Possible values are JSON and XML

camel.kamelet.fhir-source.fhirVersion.name: camel.kamelet.fhir-source.fhirVersion
camel.kamelet.fhir-source.fhirVersion.description: The FHIR Version to use. There are 6 enums and the value can be one of DSTU2, DSTU2_HL7ORG, DSTU2_1, DSTU3, R4, R5

camel.kamelet.fhir-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.fhir-source.username
camel.kamelet.fhir-source.username.description: The username to access the Fhir server

camel.kamelet.fhir-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.fhir-source.password
camel.kamelet.fhir-source.password.description: The password to access the Fhir server

camel.kamelet.fhir-source.prettyPrint.name: camel.kamelet.fhir-source.prettyPrint
camel.kamelet.fhir-source.prettyPrint.description: Define if the Json must be pretty print or not
